title: Little-Known But Important Dogecoin Indicator Goes Off, How High Can It Drive Price?
description: The Dogecoin price slump might be over very soon, according to a little-known but important indicator called the Gaussian Channel (GC). As recently noted by a crypto analyst known pseudonymously as Trader Tardigrade, the Gaussian Channel recently flashed green on the DOGE weekly chart, suggesting the crypto could surge to the upside for the next wave.
